all.title: Self-Care Randomizer Widget
all.meta_description: Need to Discover New Self-Care Activities to Reduce Stress.I've been feeling overwhelmed with work and daily responsibilities, and I'm looking to incorporate self-care into my routine but unsure where to start. I need a widget that can suggest self-care activities tailored to my current mood and available time. The widget should allow me to input how I'm feeling (e.g., anxious, tired, unmotivated) and how much time I can dedicate (e.g., 15 minutes, 1 hour). It should then provide a randomized list of activities ranging from quick exercises, mindfulness practices, creative outlets, to indulgent treats. Suggestions might include things like "Take a 20-minute walk in nature," "Try a guided meditation," or "Prepare a healthy smoothie." Including instructions or resources on how to perform the activities would be helpful. The goal is to introduce variety and make self-care engaging, helping me manage stress and improve overall well-being.

all.title: Widget that Automates market research by collecting and analyzing data
all.meta_description: Need to Conduct Market Research for Organic Pet Food Startup.I'm considering starting a business that sells organic pet food online. I need a widget that can help me conduct comprehensive market research in this niche. The widget should collect data on current competitors (both online and brick-and-mortar), market size, growth trends, consumer purchasing behaviors, and popular products or ingredients. It should analyze search trends, social media mentions, and customer reviews to identify gaps in the market or unmet needs. The widget should also provide insights into pricing strategies, marketing approaches used by competitors, and potential barriers to entry. The final output should be a detailed report with charts, graphs, and actionable insights that can inform my business plan and marketing strategy.

all.title: Travel Visa Requirement Checker Widget

An output that summarizes the requirements for each country and provides links to official government websites for applications would be ideal.

all.title: Mortgage Payment Calculator

The house price is $350,000, and I'm planning to make a down payment of 15%. It should also provide an amortization schedule showing how much of each payment goes toward principal and interest over time. An option to include extra payments to see how they affect the loan payoff date and total interest paid would be helpful. The output should be clear, with charts or graphs illustrating payment breakdowns and total costs.

all.title: Medicine Finder - local alternative
all.meta_description: As someone who has lived in multiple different countries, one of my struggles has been figuring which medicine I need to get in the country I am in. The reason is that pharmaceutical companies name the same product differently depending on the location. For example, in Russia, when I had irritation in my eyes I would get eye drops called Visine but when I asked for it in Spain they had no clue what I wanted. Turns out that exact same product by the same company is called Vispring in Spain. However, sometimes the issue is not the difference in the name but that such medicine/product simply does not exist in the given country. In those cases I have to ask the pharmacist to read the ingredients of the medicine I need and suggest another one that has the same ingredients, which can be challenging if the pharmacist doesn't speak English. So, I would like an AI Widget that takes two inputs: name of the medicine as you know it and the country where you are looking for it/its alternative. As output it should give one page pdf that gives a brief information about the medicine I am looking for, then: if it exists under a different name then mentions it, along with instruction for use; and if it doesn't then suggests 1 to 3 closest alternatives based on ingredient, along with instructions for use.

all.title: Domain Name Generator

I need a widget that can generate creative and memorable domain name ideas based on keywords like "cybersecurity," "AI," "shield," and "defense." The domain names should be short (ideally under 15 characters), easy to pronounce, and suitable for a global audience. The widget should check the availability of .com domains in real-time and possibly suggest alternatives like .io or .tech if .com is unavailable. Including options for combining words, using prefixes/suffixes, or clever misspellings is acceptable as long as the names remain professional. Providing a list of at least 50 available options would be appreciated.

python.meta_description: As someone who has lived in multiple different countries, one of my struggles has been figuring which medicine I need to get in the country I am in. Turns out that exact same product by the same company is called Vispring in Spain. However, sometimes the issue is not the difference in the name but that such medicine/product simply does not exist in the given country. In those cases I have to ask the pharmacist to read the ingredients of the medicine I need and suggest another one that has the same ingredients, which can be challenging if the pharmacist doesn't speak English. So, I would like an AI Widget that takes two inputs: name of the medicine as you know it and the country where you are looking for it/its alternative. As output it should give one page pdf that gives a brief information about the medicine I am looking for, then: if it exists under a different name then mentions it, along with instruction for use; and if it doesn't then suggests 1 to 3 closest alternatives based on ingredient, along with instructions for use.

go.title: Medicine Finder - local alternative

For example, in Russia, when I had irritation in my eyes I would get eye drops called Visine but when I asked for it in Spain they had no clue what I wanted. Turns out that exact same product by the same company is called Vispring in Spain. However, sometimes the issue is not the difference in the name but that such medicine/product simply does not exist in the given country. In those cases I have to ask the pharmacist to read the ingredients of the medicine I need and suggest another one that has the same ingredients, which can be challenging if the pharmacist doesn't speak English. So, I would like an AI Widget that takes two inputs: name of the medicine as you know it and the country where you are looking for it/its alternative. As output it should give one page pdf that gives a brief information about the medicine I am looking for, then: if it exists under a different name then mentions it, along with instruction for use; and if it doesn't then suggests 1 to 3 closest alternatives based on ingredient, along with instructions for use.

Turns out that exact same product by the same company is called Vispring in Spain. However, sometimes the issue is not the difference in the name but that such medicine/product simply does not exist in the given country. In those cases I have to ask the pharmacist to read the ingredients of the medicine I need and suggest another one that has the same ingredients, which can be challenging if the pharmacist doesn't speak English. So, I would like an AI Widget that takes two inputs: name of the medicine as you know it and the country where you are looking for it/its alternative. As output it should give one page pdf that gives a brief information about the medicine I am looking for, then: if it exists under a different name then mentions it, along with instruction for use; and if it doesn't then suggests 1 to 3 closest alternatives based on ingredient, along with instructions for use.

Providing step-by-step cooking instructions, estimated preparation and cooking times, and nutritional information would enhance the usefulness. An option to save favorite recipes or generate a shopping list for missing ingredients would be a bonus.

typescript.title: Medicine Finder - local alternative
typescript.meta_description: As someone who has lived in multiple different countries, one of my struggles has been figuring which medicine I need to get in the country I am in. The reason is that pharmaceutical companies name the same product differently depending on the location. For example, in Russia, when I had irritation in my eyes I would get eye drops called Visine but when I asked for it in Spain they had no clue what I wanted. Turns out that exact same product by the same company is called Vispring in Spain. However, sometimes the issue is not the difference in the name but that such medicine/product simply does not exist in the given country. In those cases I have to ask the pharmacist to read the ingredients of the medicine I need and suggest another one that has the same ingredients, which can be challenging if the pharmacist doesn't speak English. So, I would like an AI Widget that takes two inputs: name of the medicine as you know it and the country where you are looking for it/its alternative. As output it should give one page pdf that gives a brief information about the medicine I am looking for, then: if it exists under a different name then mentions it, along with instruction for use; and if it doesn't then suggests 1 to 3 closest alternatives based on ingredient, along with instructions for use.

I’ve tried a few tools, but they often lack one or more of these features, or the questions don’t quite capture the essence of the content. Can anyone tag a widget that could handle my aims?Thanks in advance for any suggestions!

typescript.title: Short copywriting drafts
